message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $18000. It's a steal at this price!  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to pay up to $15000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. How about $16500?  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's try to meet in the middle.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $16000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the item.
